name: Crowdscore Labs
tag_list: local-search, local-exploration, recommendation-engine, business-tools, venue-rating, venue-reviews, solomo
overview:
Crowdscore Labs is the team behind Crowdscore, a web and mobile application that adds new depth to rating and sharing experiences about local venues and finding new places to love.

Crowdscore goes beyond simply displaying user-provided input and leverages its data to help users initiate smarter searches that lead to discovering the result best suited to their tastes. With a faceted scoring system, natural language search, concise content, and social features Crowdscore brings users one step closer to the perfect local search.

Crowdscore also offers a suite of tools for Venue Owners that transforms the act of reviewing Venues into a two-way conversation between consumers and business owners. This provides business owners the means of discovering what works and what doesn’t, identifying their target customers, and building a lasting relationship with them. These tools also give consumers the opportunity to participate in the betterment of local Venues.
